H0.text: What colour are the two stars on the national flag of Syria. Red

H1.text: What colour are the two stars on the national flag of Syria. Yellow

H2.text: What colour are the two stars on the national flag of Syria. Blue

H3.text: What colour are the two stars on the national flag of Syria. Green

A4.text: The flag of the Syrian Arab Republic consists of four colours: red, white and black, with two green stars, of five angles each.

A5.text: with the two green stars in the middle of the white rectangle.
